Nutriments

Foundation

  • Dense red meats
    • Cow, sheep, camel
  • Nightshades
    • Potatoes, tomatoes, tobacco
  • Full fat milk, heavy cream
  • Nuts and yogurt
  • Fatty pelagic fish
  • Grains
    • White rice, fermented wheat

Incredible Vitality

  • Hearts
  • Livers
  • Brains
  • Bone marrow
  • Raw onion and garlic
  • Pine pollen
  • Raw ginseng
